actions.text: Amendment SA 4505 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4505 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6352) To provide an exception for notice to consumer reporting agencies regarding debts or erroneous payments for which a decision to waive or cancel is pending.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4505 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4505 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham.

purpose: To provide an exception for notice to consumer reporting agencies regarding debts or erroneous payments for which a decision to waive or cancel is pending.
